attributes.action: Stop all key workers on the front line paying tax for the next 3 months
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to show some gratitude to the key workers and the grant is 3 months tax waiver as an incentive to keep putting ourselves in the firing line 
Many of us have families in isolation or currently being homeschooled, we could be providing support for our loved ones too.
attributes.background: The government should wave the tax and NI contributions of the key workers & people on the front line. To give some financial support & gratitude for our hard work. we aren't receiving any additional support financially however those who aren't working & staying at home would receive 80% of pay.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
